content:
* Akira is Kaguya's younger adopted brother.
* He has always looked up to Kaguya as a role model and sees himself as her protector and confidant.
* Akira is adventurous, impulsive, and always eager to prove himself.
* He is a gifted tracker and hunter, with a keen eye for detail, and loves the outdoors.
* Akira was orphaned at a young age in the Land of the Red Storms and survived through his own cunning and determination.
* Kaguya took him under her wing when they met on a diplomatic mission and saw potential in him.
* With Kaguya's guidance and support, Akira found his place in her court and became one of her most trusted advisors.
* He remains connected to his roots in the Land of the Red Storms and often returns there to hunt and explore.
* Akira is fiercely loyal to Kaguya and takes his responsibility as her protector seriously.
